attributes.action: remove des browne as sectary of state for scotland so he can focus on the MoD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I currently feel sorry for Des Browne. Hearing him today on the radio, he seems so busy doing 'Scotland in my spare time' and as such I'm creating this petition to allow him to spend more time with his family and constituents. After all, the primary job of an MP is to represent his constituency. It may also help him sort out the MoD...
